entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
